#summary Sets the progress display mode/type
#labels Phase-Implementation,Libseven-Docuimentation

= Synopsis =

*void* SetProgressType(*int* _type_);

= Description =

SetProgressType() sets the type of progress indicator that is displayed over the associated window's taskbar button, as specified by _type_

_type_ may be one of the following:
|| TASKBAR_PROGRESS || This sets the progress indicator to a standard green progress bar. ||
|| TASKBAR_PAUSED || This sets the progress indicator to a paused yellow progress bar. ||
|| TASKBAR_NORMAL || This clears the progress indicator, and is the normal condition. ||
|| TASKBAR_INDETERMINATE || This is for the rolling green bar for indeterminate progress. ||
